caption.title: Range shifts for future projected scenarios.
caption.p: Maps of the range shifts resulting from the eight different future projected scenarios: 2.6, 4.5, 6.0 and 8.5 RCPs for 2050 (A, B, C and D, respectively) and 2070 (E, F, G and H, respectively). Area lost by the target species is reported in red, stable areas are reported in yellow, while areas gained is reported in green.
